hero.badge: v2.0 is now live with Distributed Scanning
hero.subheadline: Scan websites, APIs, and modern applications using industry-proven tools like ZAP and FFUF — all from one unified, cloud-based platform.

features.title: Built for Modern Security Teams
features.subtitle: Stop wasting time on local tool setup. Our cloud platform provides a unified interface for the world's most powerful security engines.

discovery.title: Deep Discovery
discovery.desc: Find hidden endpoints and directories with high-speed fuzzing engines. Built-in support for multiple wordlists.

analysis.title: Real-time Analysis
analysis.desc: Get structured findings from OWASP ZAP as the scan progresses. No need to wait for multi-hour jobs to complete.

distributed.title: Distributed Execution
distributed.desc: Your scans run on our secure, scalable infrastructure. Launch hundreds of concurrent jobs without slowing down.

tools.title: Powerful Engines Under the Hood
tools.subtitle: We've normalized the output and configuration of industry-proven tools into a single, cohesive workflow.

items.ffuf: Fast Fuzzing Utility for directory and endpoint discovery.
items.nmap: Comprehensive network discovery and security auditing.
items.sqlmap: Advanced SQL injection detection and testing.
items.custom: Support for proprietary and custom security tools.

howItWorks.title: Built for Continuous Security
howItWorks.subtitle: Scanning your application shouldn't be a project. Our 4-step workflow makes it a routine.

step1.title: Configure Scope
step1.desc: Define targets, choose your tool, and set scanning options.

step2.title: Authenticate
step2.desc: Provide session cookies or tokens for deeper authenticated scans.

step3.title: Queue & Run
step3.desc: Jobs are dispatched to our secure cloud cluster automatically.

step4.title: Analyze Results
step4.desc: View normalized reports and actionable security findings.

auth.title: Scan Behind the Login Screen.
auth.subtitle: Automated scanners often miss the most critical parts of your app — the areas protected by authentication. Our platform makes it easy to provide credentials securely.
items: Full support for Bearer Tokens & API Keys
Inject session cookies for stateful scanning
Scan admin panels and private API routes

trust.title: Transparency & Limitations
trust.subtitle: We believe in a professional, no-nonsense approach to security tools.

captcha.title: CAPTCHA Handling
captcha.desc: Automated solvers for CAPTCHA are currently not supported. We recommend using authenticated session cookies to bypass protections that are designed to block automated traffic.

credits.title: Credits System
credits.desc: To ensure fair usage and prevent platform abuse, each scan consumes credits. This allow us to maintain a high-quality, distributed infrastructure for all users.

cta.title: Ready to Secure Your Applications?
cta.subtitle: No local setup. No complex manual commands. Just select your tool, enter your target, and get results.
cta.joined: Join 500+ security teams already using our platform.

personas.title: Who is this for?
personas.subtitle: Built by security pros, for the modern tech stack.

items.title: Security Engineers
items.benefit: Automate repetitive tasks and focus on deep manual penetration testing.

items.title: Backend Developers
items.benefit: Ensure your APIs are secure before they hit production environments.

items.title: DevOps Teams
items.benefit: Integrate security scanning into your CI/CD pipelines effortlessly.

items.title: Consultants
items.benefit: Provide high-quality security audits for clients with professional reports.
